title: Hashing – Two Sum O(n)
description: Find two indices whose values sum to target using a HashMap complement lookup.
explanation: Store each number with its index. For each new number check if complement already seen. Time: O(n).

title: Hashing – Anagram Check O(n)
description: Check if two strings are anagrams using a character frequency map.
explanation: Count chars in first string, decrement for second. Any negative count means strings differ. O(n) time.
